00016 MessageConsole::MessageConsole(QWidget *parent):
00017 QTextEdit(parent),
00018 copyAction_(tr("Copy"), this),
00019 selectAllAction_(tr("Select all"), this),
00020 clearAction_(tr("Clear"), this),
00021 copyAvailable_(false) {
00022 
00023         setReadOnly(true);
00024 
00025         copyAction_.setDisabled(true);
00026 
00027         connect(&copyAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00028                 this, SLOT(copy()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00029         connect(&selectAllAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00030                 this, SLOT(selectAll()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00031         connect(&clearAction_, SIGNAL(triggered()),
00032                 this, SLOT(clear()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00033         connect(this, SIGNAL(copyAvailable(bool)),
00034                 this, SLOT(onCopyAvailable(bool)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00035 }

00037 MessageConsole::~MessageConsole() {
00038 }

00040 void MessageConsole::onErrorMessage( const QString& message ) {
00041         moveCursor(QTextCursor::End);
00042 
00043         // errors are printed in red color
00044         setTextColor(QColor("red"));
00045         insertPlainText(tr("Error: ") + message);
00046 
00047         // add endline and set cursor to the end of the text
00048         insertPlainText("\n");
00049         moveCursor(QTextCursor::End);
00050 }
00051 
00052 void MessageConsole::onNoticeMessage( const QString& message ) {
00053         moveCursor(QTextCursor::End);
00054 
00055         // notices are printed in blue
00056         setTextColor(QColor("blue"));
00057         insertPlainText(message);
00058 
00059         // add endline and set cursor to the end of the text
00060         insertPlainText("\n");
00061         moveCursor(QTextCursor::End);
00062 }
00063 
00064 void MessageConsole::printLog(const QString& path /*= QString()*/ ) {
00065 
00066         QString filePath = path;
00067 
00068         // if path was not defined then print log to the same location as the 
00069         // executable
00070         if (path.isEmpty()) {
00071                 filePath = QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath();
00072                 filePath += QString("/");
00073                 filePath += QCoreApplication::applicationName();
00074                 filePath += QString("_log.txt");
00075         }
00076 
00077         QFile logFile(filePath);
00078 
00079         // if the file can not be opened for writing
00080         if (!logFile.open(QFile::WriteOnly | QFile::Append)) {
00081                 onErrorMessage(tr("Could not open log file for writing"));
00082                 return;
00083         }
00084 
00085         // create the text stream that writes into file
00086         QTextStream logStream(&logFile);
00087 
00088         // write the contents of the message console
00089         logStream << toPlainText();
00090 
00091         // close the file
00092         logFile.close();
00093 }
00094 
00095 void MessageConsole::contextMenuEvent( QContextMenuEvent* event ) {
00096 
00097         copyAction_.setEnabled(copyAvailable_);
00098 
00099         QMenu menu;
00100         menu.addAction(&copyAction_);
00101         menu.addAction(&selectAllAction_);
00102         menu.addAction(&clearAction_);
00103         menu.exec(event->globalPos());
00104 }
00105 
00106 void MessageConsole::onCopyAvailable( bool yes ) {
00107         copyAvailable_ = yes;
00108 }
